platform.name: GetYouSite
platform.vision: Sovereign Digital Infrastructure for Professional Entities.

support.delivery_time: Standard delivery in 48 hours for automated nodes.
support.localization: Full RTL/LTR support including Arabic, English, French.

guidelines.security: All payment data is handled via PayPal Secure TEE. No card data stored on-site.
guidelines.activation: Subscription activation is handled via server-side PayPal order capture.
